doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Usage of binary model under license governing simulator usage. Source of model available under Imperas Software License Agreement.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: If this model is not part of your installation, then it is available for download from www.OVPworld.org/MIPSuser.

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Models have been validated correct as part of the MIPS Verified program and run through the MIPS AVP test programs

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: ISA model - generic instruction set, minimal COP0 implementation

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Pointer to platform-provided BIU cache info structure

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable MIPS-specific magic Pass/Fail opcodes (specific for AVP test termination)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: When set, cache index ops do not generate TLB exceptions

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override whether processor implements supervisor mode

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override bus error exception behavior. When true, accesses of memory not defined by platform will cause bus error exceptions

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the MMU type to fixed mapping when true (sets Config.MT=3, Config.KU/K23=2 and Config1.MMUSizeM1=0)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the DSP-present configuration when true (sets Config3.DSPP/DSP2P=0)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the CMP-Present configuration when true (sets Config3.CMGCR and GCR_BASE to 0)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the FP-Present configuration when true (sets Config1.FP to 0)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable to specify ISA model (reset address from ELF, all coprocessors enabled)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Deprecated - Instead set config1MMUSizeM1 to maximum value to improve performance

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify number of ITC cells present (MT cores only)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify number of ITC FIFO cells in reference ITC implementation (MT cores only)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable multi-threaded FPU (1:old mttc1 behavior, 2:new mttc1 behavior)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Enable to specify that the FPU supports denormal operands and results

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specifies the maximum TCs initially on VPE0

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Number of regions for memory protection unit

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override power on value of Config.K0 (set Kseg0 cacheability)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override power on value of Config.KU (set Useg cacheability)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override power on value of Config.K23 (set Kseg23 cacheability)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override Config3.VEIC (enables the use of an external interrupt controller)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override Config4.MMUConfig field (interpretation depends on MMUExtDef value)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override power on value of Config6.FTLBEn

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override FCSR.NAN2008 (QNaN/SNaN encodings match IEEE 754-2008 recommendation)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override FIR.PS (PS floating point type implemented)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override FIR.Has2008 (one or more IEEE 754-2008 features present)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override SRSCtl.HSS (number of shadow register sets)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify the BEV Exception Base address. (use GCR_Cx_RESET_BASE on CMP processors)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Set to one to use ExceptionBase[29:12] as the corresponding BEV address bits

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify LSB position of GCR_Cx_RESET_EXT_BASE.BEVExceptionBaseMask field. Only used when SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Set to one to reset into non-legacy address map and BEV location. Only used when non-CMP and SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Specify the ExceptionBaseMask value used for bits [27:firstBEVExceptionBaseMaskBit]. Only used when non-CMP and SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Bits [35:29] of the physical address for the BEV overlays. Only used when non-CMP and SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GIC unit present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: CPC unit present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: cpu timer interrupt routable within cluster

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: software interrupt routable within cluster

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: override GCR_CONFIG.PCORES (number of cores-1)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: override GCR_BASE.GCR_BASE (default GCR register address)

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GCR_CL_RESET_BASE for core 0

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GCR_CL_RESET_BASE for core 1

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GCR_CL_RESET_BASE for core 2

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GCR_CL_RESET_BASE for core 3

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GCR_CL_RESET_EXT_BASE for core 0. Only used when SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GCR_CL_RESET_EXT_BASE for core 1. Only used when SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GCR_CL_RESET_EXT_BASE for core 2. Only used when SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: CMP system only: GCR_CL_RESET_EXT_BASE for core 3. Only used when SegCtl present

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: Override the external interrupt controller EIC_OPTION

doctext.name: txt
doctext.text: specify instruction address range for synchronous execution
